TopicTitle: NASA funds direct drive fusion propulsion

Articles.Content:
This seems similar to NASA's project back in good ol' 2013, only this time, they're proposing a Pluto orbiter/lander, instead of a manned Mars mission
.

http://nextbigfuture.com/2016/04/nasa-funds-direct-drive-fusion.html

Seems pretty cool

First, they should build a working engine and prove it can create sufficient thrust without falling apart - or being prohibitively heavy\expensive\difficult to build. Proposal of a Pluto mission looks very far-fetched.
